findings.title: TWAP window too short for low-liquidity asset
findings.description: The TWAP oracle uses only a 25-minute window. For low-liquidity pairs, an attacker can manipulate the price over this period with sustained trading pressure, then exploit the manipulated TWAP.
findings.impact: Attacker borrows against inflated collateral value, creating bad debt.
findings.recommendation: Increase TWAP window to 4-24 hours for low-liquidity assets. Add circuit breakers for unusual price movements.
